product.title: InStylerÂ® Instyler Tulip Auto Curler Automatic Curling Tong Iron Wave...
product.description:
The Instyler Tulip Auto Curler is very easy and comfortable to use with its lightweight Design. It has an open barrel design, so you can always see what you are doing, preventing it from getting tangled. The sufficient space surrounding the barrel also makes it easy to curl even the longest, thickest hair. It has integrated No Burn safety guards that make certain the heated barrel is safely contained well within the Instyler Tulip Auto Curler body, ensuring it should never come into contact with your ears, neck or scalp. Its Tap Button Control creates the perfect curl every time and its three heat and timer settings so it works for any type of hair in just moments. The Instyler Tulip Auto Curlers innovative automatic curling technology lets you relax while it does all the work. With its two-way rotation you don't need to hold it at funny angles. This great innovative curler has a high quality 22mm Tourmaline Ceramic Barrel for ease of use and salon quality results. Creating frizz-free shiny waves and curls. The Tourmaline Ceramic Barrel will gently heat up your hair without pulling or tugging, reducing breakage and damage.Features: & Perfect curls and waves in 3 seconds every time! & 2-Way auto rotation curls left & right & Its Open Barrel design ensures you always see what you are doing & Tap button automatic operation & 3 rotation settings A - you control the direction & 3 timer settings - you can choose from tight curls or beachy waves & 3 heat settings up to 220 C - perfect for fine, medium & thick hair & Automatic safety shut off & CE Approved & 3m professional swivel cord & Anti tangle technology & No burn safety guard & Tourmaline ceramic barrel for gentle, no frizz styling



Package Contents:



1 x Instyler Tulip Auto Curler





ts Open Barrel design ensures you always see what you are doing





3 rotation settings - you control the direction





3 timer settings - you can choose from tight curls or beachy waves





3 heat settings up to 220 C - perfect for fine, medium & thick hair





Anti tangle technology

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
